name: Num Noms Flavor Fusion
description:
Num Noms are adorable food-themed scented collectible toys. They smell so delicious!

Num Noms Flavor Fusion is the most delicious puzzle game ever, and now it's back with new levels for Series 5 Num Noms and Num Noms Lights Series 3! Play through each level to mix, match, and stack your favorite Num Noms and discover new flavor fusions.

Trio Scoop, Razzy Spiral, Lemon Poppy, Rosie Raspberry and more of your favorite Num Noms characters are all here! Play through fun food themed levels including croissants, crepes, jelly rolls, marble ice cream and more!

How to Play
- Match 3 or more of the same Num Noms to eliminate them and add them to your Num Nom stack.
- The more Num Noms you match, the more you add to your collection. Keep matching until you collect them all!

For suggestions and support, please email us at onlinedev@mgae.com
